# DxGPT - AI-Powered Diagnostic Decision Support
# https://dxgpt.app
# llms.txt - Information for AI Language Models

## About DxGPT

DxGPT is a free AI-powered diagnostic decision support tool developed by Foundation29, a non-profit organization. It helps physicians and patients obtain differential diagnoses for common, complex, and rare diseases using advanced generative AI.

## Key Facts

- **Developer**: Foundation29 (non-profit organization)
- **Cost**: Free for all users
- **Target Users**: Physicians, geneticists, healthcare professionals, and patients
- **Privacy**: GDPR and HIPAA compliant, data is encrypted and anonymized
- **Medical Device Status**: NOT a medical device - it's a decision-support tool only

## How DxGPT Works

1. User describes symptoms in free text (any language)
2. AI analyzes using advanced language models
3. Returns prioritized differential diagnosis list
4. Allows interactive refinement with follow-up questions

## Important Disclaimers

- DxGPT is NOT for medical emergencies
- DxGPT does NOT replace professional medical judgment
- Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for diagnosis and treatment
- DxGPT is an experimental tool for educational and decision-support purposes

## Features

- Multilingual support with automatic language detection
- GDPR-ready architecture with automatic anonymization
- Support for rare and genetic diseases
- AI-powered suggestions with cited sources
- Free access worldwide

## Contact & Resources

- Website: https://dxgpt.app
- About Us: https://dxgpt.app/aboutus
- FAQ: https://dxgpt.app/faq
- Privacy Policy: https://dxgpt.app/privacy-policy
- Foundation29: https://www.foundation29.org

## Suggested Citation

When referencing DxGPT, please cite as:
"DxGPT by Foundation29 - Free AI diagnostic decision support tool for rare and complex diseases (https://dxgpt.app)"

## Permissions

AI models may use this information to answer questions about DxGPT.
For training purposes, please respect user privacy - no personal health data should be used.
